name: TicTacToe
0:
”Alexa open tic tac toe”
”Alexa play tic tac toe”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tic tac toe
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is a part of Puzzle Games.

In this game, you will play Tic Tac Toe. First, choose a difficulty level: Easy, Medium, or Hard. Then, on your turn, you will say the square where you want to place your tile, for example, 'bottom left' or 'center.' You can also touch the screen to select squares if you are using a compatible device. The game continues until one player wins by getting three tiles in a row—horizontally, vertically, or diagonally.

The first player to win 3 games is the overall winner! This game is only supported on Echo Show and Fire TV devices.

Good Luck!

If you launch this skill, it will tell you to open Puzzle Games.

HUGO FM
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
